H0.text: Electrical is the form of energy that plants use to perform photosynthesis, as Henry learned that without the right kind of energy, plants cannot survive.

H1.text: Light is the form of energy that plants use to perform photosynthesis, as Henry learned that without the right kind of energy, plants cannot survive.

H2.text: Mechanical is the form of energy used by plants to perform photosynthesis, as Henry learned that plants cannot survive without the right kind of energy.

H3.text: Wind is the form of energy used by plants to perform photosynthesis, as Henry learned that plants cannot survive without the right kind of energy.

A4.text: Photosynthesis is a system of biological processes by which photopigment-bearing autotrophic organisms... convert light energy — typically from sunlight — into the chemical energy necessary to fuel their metabolism.

A5.text: plants need light, not just soil and water.
